successes.title: The Unstainable™ White Shirt
successes.description: Never fear wearing white again! From coffee to wine to salad dressing and even sweat are no match for The Unstainable™ White Shirt.

Pledges.description: A big thank you on Twitter + receive newsletter updates on our progress!
Choose 1 Unstainable tee + a big thank you on Twitter + receive newsletter updates on our progress!
As an early-bird backer, choose 1 Unstainable blouse in any style for only $40 + a big thank you on Twitter + receive newsletter updates on our progress!
Regular bird: Choose 1 Unstainable blouse in any style + a big thank you on Twitter + receive newsletter updates on our progress!
As an early-bird backer, choose 1 Unstainable blouse in any style + 1 Unstainable tee for only $65 + a big thank you on Twitter + receive newsletter updates on our progress!
Choose 1 Unstainable blouse and 1 Unstainable tee in any style + a big thank you on Twitter + receive newsletter updates on our progress!
Mother's Day Pledge Level. Your Mom gets 1 Unstainable blouse + 1 Unstainable tee in September + 1 beautiful, custom card on Mother's Day
Choose 2 Unstainable blouses in any style + a big thank you on Twitter + receive newsletter updates on our progress!
Choose 2 Unstainable blouses and 1 Unstainable tee in any style + a big thank you on Twitter + receive newsletter updates on our progress!
Choose 4 Unstainable blouses OR 3 Unstainable blouses and 2 Unstainable tees in any style + a big thank you on Twitter + receive newsletter updates on our progress!
Choose 5 Unstainable blouses OR 4 Unstainable blouses and 2 Unstainable tees in any style + a big thank you on Twitter + receive newsletter updates on our progress!
Get 2 of every Unstainable shirt style (6 blouses + 2 tees) + a big thank you on Twitter + receive newsletter updates on our progress!
Choose 10 Unstainable blouses OR 8 Unstainable blouses and 4 tees in any style + a big thank you on Twitter + receive newsletter updates on our progress!

As a premium backer, receive the entire Collection in every style times 6! You get a total of 24 shirts, custom-made to your exact measurements in our studio in NYC plus a shirt named after you in the Winter 2015 Collection + a big thank you on Twitter + receive newsletter updates on our progress!
(transportation and accommodations in NYC not included)

As a premium backer, receive the entire Collection in every style times 6! You get a total of 24 shirts, custom-made to your exact measurements in our studio in NYC plus a shirt named after you in the Spring 2016 Collection + a big thank you on Twitter + receive newsletter updates on our progress!
(transportation and accommodations in NYC not included)

As a premium backer, receive the entire Collection in every style times 6! You get a total of 24 shirts, custom-made to your exact measurements in our studio in NYC plus a shirt named after you in the Summer 2016 Collection + a big thank you on Twitter + receive newsletter updates on our progress!
